Summary: VERY bright and pulsating reddish/orange with bright white flashes. NO SOUND-came right over us..low so bright couldn't make out shape.
divs: sighting detailsstepped out at 9:40pm-looking north my husband and i saw a very bright red light. at first we thought it was fireworks of some kind but then it began to move very slow toward us. it came over head with absolutely no sound..changing colors from very bright red to very white\yellowish light..it was sunlight bright..it moved over our heads and gained speed..very quickly moving in the southwesterly direction..disappearing rapidly. this happened too quickly for us to grab our flip video.
